name: SURVIVE DEMO
description:
Please help me to Finish this game! Once you have played it please quickly visit http://fluidsurveys.com/surveys/lost601-gaming/survive-demo-1-survey/ and answer a few quick questions which will help me to continue the project.

Thank You Ever So Much!

There is no sound added at this stage,

This is my "demo" version, pretty much everything in it is subject to change.
SURVIVE is (currently) a top down, zombie shooting, tactical, survival game.

Run around using WSAD or the arrow keys but only arrow keys work in the car at present.  Press C to drink a cure if you get infected or your health will slowly tick down. Hold Left Mouse button to shoot and use Space Bar to reload.
Return key to exit the vehicle, or just drive it until the engine dies (due to excessive crashing)
1,2 & 3 change weapon.

Score points by staying alive! Watch the Start Menu to get an understanding of the different types of zombies...

...oh yeah, they can eventually bust through walls too!

Vehicle camera is currently horrible.  Have Fun!

This game will be updated in Jan 2014.
